item.title: Banning command codeing
item.dc:creator: @buckeys9 buckeys9
item.description:
@buckeys9 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 1) {
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Banning command codeing
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 1) {
String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Staff Member " + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                }
            }
        }[/code]
